特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Interactive discussion, student-led reading assignments, independent research. Regular attendance is expected -- students must contact the instructor via e-mail anytime they plan on being absent from class.

第14回:
Final Draft of Thesis Proposal Due (submitted to the seminar instructor via e-mail before class, and also to be presented in class)
Important Notice: late submission of the Thesis Proposal will result in a penalty of -20% on the overall seminar grade
End of Term 1
第23回:
Nov. 24 - Rough Draft of Graduation Thesis Due (submitted to the seminar instructor via e-mail before class, and also to be presented in class)
Important Notice: late submission of the rough draft will result in a penalty of -20% on the overall seminar grade
第27回:
Dec. 22 - Graduation Thesis Final Draft Due (to be submitted to SIS and to the seminar instructor)
Important Notice: late submission of the final draft will result in a penalty of -20% on the final graduation thesis grade
トピック.授業外学習2: The graduation thesis requires a great deal of independent study and research, and due dates for the rough draft and final draft are strictly enforced: late submission of the rough draft will result in a penalty of -20% on the overall seminar grade, and late submission of the final draft will result in a penalty of -20% on the final graduation thesis grade. This means that students will need self-discipline and self-management skills in this course.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Weekly Readings, Written Summaries, Thesis Editing

name: 【400】Research Seminar II　６／Research Seminar II [EN]
担当者: デソーテ　フランソワ（DE SOETE FRANCOIS）
